Title: Implements the effective background check act of 2019; requires background checks for employees who would be authorized to possess or transfer firearms
Summary: Implements the effective background check act of 2018; requires background checks for employees who would be authorized to possess or transfer firearms.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to enacting the effective background check act of 2019, in relation to requiring background checks for employees who would be authorized to possess or transfer firearms, rifles, or shotguns
